participant_1.name: Lila Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing with a strong passion for animal welfare.
participant_1.background: I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare. I enjoy eating Italian food. I enjoy listening to music and thinking about my next move. I'm afraid that my students will fail to learn and grow. I used to go clubbing every weekend, but now I prefer to stay home with my family and pug.

participant_2.name: Jake Miller
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and nostalgic, with a love for antiques and 80s music.
participant_2.background: I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues. I like to read books. I give out sports information. I have a sweet tooth. I went to Japan once, and it was amazing!

content.text: Hello there! What do you think of animal welfare?
I think it is important to be kind to animals. I like to eat meat but I want to make sure that the animals are treated well.
I agree! I love animals. I used to be a teacher but now I use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
That is really cool! I love playing video games. Do you have any favorites?
I love playing strategy games. I am also a big fan of RPGs.
I like RPGs too! I have been playing a lot of Elder Scrolls Online lately.
I have not played that one yet. I have been playing a lot of Total War: Warhammer 2.
I have heard good things about that game. I am a big fan of the Warhammer universe.
It is a lot of fun! I am really enjoying it.
I might have to check it out!
You should! It is a great game.
